Question: After the 1998 divorce, this person became engaged to the model Marcus Schenkenberg; they broke up in 2001.
Hints: On 14 August 2005, Comedy Central created the Roast of this person to honor the sex symbol for the past decade.
This person then starred in Pam: Girl on the Loose, which debuted on 3 August 2008 on E! in the United States.
This person has since appeared in Playboy several times in the 1990s and 2000s.
